Restaurants.name: McDonald
Restaurants.desc: McDonald's Corporation is an American fast food company, founded in 1940 as a restaurant operated by Richard and Maurice McDonald, in San Bernardino, California, United States.

Restaurants.name: Taco Bell
Restaurants.desc: Taco Bell is an American-based chain of fast food restaurants originating in Irvine, California in 1962, by founder Glen Bell. Taco Bell is a subsidiary of Yum! Brands, Inc.

Restaurants.name: Cava
Restaurants.desc: CAVA is a fast-casual serving modern Mediterranean customizable and curated bowls, salads and pitas with flavor-forward ingredients, made in-house every day. The restaurant is piloting drive-thru-style pickups at several locations.

Restaurants.name: Chick-fil-A
Restaurants.desc: McDonald's Corporation is an American fast food company, founded in 1940 as a restaurant operated by Richard and Maurice McDonald, in San Bernardino, California, United States.

Restaurants.name: Dominos Pizza
Restaurants.desc: Domino's Pizza, Inc., branded as Domino's, is an American multinational pizza restaurant chain founded in 1961. The corporation is Delaware-domiciled and headquartered at the Domino's Farms Office Park in Ann Arbor, Michigan.

Restaurants.name: Popeyes
Restaurants.desc: Popeyes is an American multinational chain of fried chicken fast food restaurants founded in 1972 in New Orleans, Louisiana and headquartered in Miami, Florida.
